install.name: Creative Clans Slide Show
install.author: Guido Tonnaer
install.license: GNU/GPL (The CCSlideShow.swf flash file contained in this module is released under a different license. If you want to use it outside of the Joomla module, please refer to http://www.creativeclans.nl for more info.)
install.description: Creative Clans Slide Show - Joomla 1.5 module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: The suffix to be added to class of slideshow_s wrapper div. By default the slideshow wrapper div has class _ccslideshow_. You can add any suffix string to that class for CSS styling.

param.name: path
param.label: Path
param.description: Contains the absolute path to the slides folder, WITH the final slash.

param.name: images
param.label: Images
param.description: List of the image names, one image per line.

param.name: captions
param.label: Captions
param.description: List of the captions, one caption per line.

param.name: links
param.label: Links
param.description: List of links, one link per line.

param.name: width
param.label: Width (px)
param.description: The width of slideshow module specified in pixels.

param.name: height
param.label: Height (px)
param.description: The height of slideshow module specified in pixels.

param.name: backgroundColor
param.label: Background color
param.description: The slideshow background color. The color value must be specified in the format 0xXXXXXX. For example: 0xFFFFFF (white).

param.name: loops
param.label: Loops
param.description: You can specify how many times to loop your slide show. Value _0_ means infinite loops. Value has to be numeric.

param.name: wait
param.label: Wait (ms)
param.description: Time the slide is shown (in milliseconds). Value has to be numeric.

param.name: effectTime
param.label: Effect time (s)
param.description: Duration of the transition effect between slides (in seconds). Value has to be numeric.

param.name: includeEffects
param.label: Include effects
param.description: List of transition effects to be used (one effect per line). If you want to use all available effects, omit this parameter or leave it empty. Possible values: see documentation (www.creativeclans.nl).

param.name: excludeEffects
param.label: Exclude effects
param.description: List of transition effects not to be used (one effect per line). If you want to use all available effects, omit this parameter or leave it empty. Possible values: see documentation (www.creativeclans.nl).

param.name: stopOnMouseOver
param.label: Stop on mouse over
param.description: If _yes_, the slide show is paused while the mouse hovers over the slideshow.

param.name: enableLinks
param.label: Enable links
param.description: If _yes_, clicking on the slide will open the link defined in the _Link_ parameter, or, if that doesn't have a value, the link defined for each slide in _Links_.

param.name: link
param.label: Link
param.description: If used, it replaces the link of all slides.

param.name: linkTarget
param.label: Link target
param.description: Specify the target of the link.
param.option: The current frame in the current window
The parent of the current frame
The top-level frame in the current window

param.name: order
param.label: Order
param.description: Order in which the slides are shown.

param.name: slides
param.label: Number of slides
param.description: You can specify how many of the images must be shown. Is used when _Order_ is _random_. Value _0_ means all images. Value has to be numeric.

param.name: borderStyle
param.label: Style
param.description: Choose the border style.

param.name: borderColor
param.label: Color
param.description: The border color is used when _Style_ is _solid_ or _blurred_. The color value must be specified in the format 0xXXXXXX. For example: 0x000000 (black).

param.name: borderThickness
param.label: Thickness
param.description: The border thickness is used when _Style_ is _solid_ or _blurred_. Value has to be numeric.

param.name: borderAlpha
param.label: Transparancy
param.description: The border transparancy is used when _Style_ is _solid_ or _blurred_. Value has to be numeric from 0 to 1.0.

param.name: captionStyle
param.label: Style
param.description: Choose the caption style.

param.name: captionType
param.label: Type
param.description: The caption type is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_.

param.name: captionBackgroundColor
param.label: Background color
param.description: The caption background color is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. The color value must be specified in the format 0xXXXXXX. For example: 0x000000 (black).

param.name: captionColor
param.label: Color
param.description: The caption color is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. The color value must be specified in the format 0xXXXXXX. For example: 0xFFFFFF (white).

param.name: captionText
param.label: Text
param.description: The caption text is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. If used, it replaces the caption text of all slides.

param.name: captionTextRightMargin
param.label: Text right margin
param.description: The caption text right margin is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. Has to be a numeric value.

param.name: captionTextLeftMargin
param.label: Text left margin
param.description: The caption text left margin is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. Has to be a numeric value.

param.name: captionTextBottomMargin
param.label: Text bottom margin
param.description: The caption text bottom margin is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. Has to be a numeric value.

param.name: captionTextFont
param.label: Font
param.description: The caption text font is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. If the font doesn't exist, the default flash font (Times New Roman) will be used.

param.name: captionTextFontSize
param.label: Font size
param.description: The caption text font size is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. Has to be a numeric value.

param.name: captionBackgroundAlpha
param.label: Transparancy
param.description: The caption transparancy is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _text_. Value has to be numeric from 0 to 1.0.

param.name: captionPosition
param.label: Position
param.description: The caption position is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_.

param.name: captionHorizontalOffset
param.label: Horizontal offset
param.description: The caption horizontal offset is used when _Position_ is _offset_. Has to be a numeric value.

param.name: captionVerticalOffset
param.label: Vertical offset
param.description: The caption vertical offset is used when _Position_ is _offset_. Has to be a numeric value.

param.name: captionImage
param.label: Image
param.description: The caption image is used when _Style_ is _fixed_ or _hide_, and _Type_ is _image_. Has to contain the absolute path to the image to be used.
